name: STUDYID
label: Study ID. Default to 'XX9999-9999'.

name: DOMAIN
label: SDTM domain. Default to 'LB'.

name: SITE
label: Site identifier, e.g. '101'.

name: SUBJID
label: Subject identifier, e.g. '101201'.

name: FSUBJID
required: Mandatory when scrambled subject IDs are requested, see 'Blinding' sheet
label: Scrambled subject ID. [If scrambling is not needed:] Default to NULL.

name: VISIT
label: Visit name, see 'Visits' sheet.

name: LBREFID
label: Unique sample identifier:  Sample ID, requisition number or barcode, e.g. 'AB124578'.

name: TOPICCD
label: Topic code, see 'Lab, content' sheet.

name: SUPTEST
label: Supplier assessment name.

name: LBORRES
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained
label: Result. LBORRES should be NULL if a result is not obtained.

name: LBSTRESC
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained and the result is categorical
label: Character result in standardised format. LBSTRESC should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist LBSTRESC (e.g. 'NEGATIVE')  or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.  LBSTRESC should be NULL for numeric results.

name: UNITCOLL
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained for numeric assessments except for unitless data
label: Collected unit. UNITCOLL should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist UNIT (e.g. 'mmol/L') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.  Supplier should not perform unit-based conversion of results.  UNITCOLL should be NULL for unitless data, e.g. pH.

name: LBORNRLO
required: Mandatory if there is a reference range with a lower limit
label: Lower limit of supplier reference range applicable to the subject in same unit as the result. LBORNRLO should be NULL if there is no lower limit. See 'Supplier guidance' sheet.

name: LBORNRHI
required: Mandatory if there is a reference range with an upper limit
label: Upper limit of supplier reference range applicable to the subject in same unit as the result. LBORNRHI should be NULL if there is no upper limit. See 'Supplier guidance' sheet.

name: LBNRIND
required: Mandatory if: • LBORNRLO is populated and LBORRES is below LBORNRLO or  • LBORNRHI is populated and LBORRES is above LBORNRHI
label: Reference range indicator. Indicates where the result falls with respect to reference range defined by LBORNRLO and LBORNRHI. • If LBORRES is below LBORNRLO: 'LOW' • If LBORRES is above LBORNRHI: 'HIGH' • Otherwise: NULL

name: LBSTAT
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Completion status. Populate with 'NOT DONE' if LBORRES is NULL, otherwise NULL.

name: LBREASND
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Reason why result could not be obtained. For texts that exceed 200 characters, please use the COMMENTALL column and provide an abbreviated text in LBREASND. Please discuss this approach with the Novo Nordisk study team.

name: LBNAM
label: Short name of the laboratory that performed the assessment. Default to 'LAB X'. [Short name as specified in 'List of MFT suppliers'.  Note that if the supplier is delivering results from assessments performed by other labs, the red text above should be changed to list the names of these  labs.]

name: LBLOINC
label: LOINC code.

name: LOINCVER
label: LOINC code version.

name: LBSPEC
required: Mandatory, except in rare cases where specimen is irrelevant
label: Specimen type. LBSPEC should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist SPECTYPE (e.g. 'PLASMA', 'SERUM', 'URINE') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.

name: LBMETHOD
label: Method of assessment or examination. LBMETHOD should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist METHOD (e.g. 'ELISA') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.

name: LBANMETH
label: Analysis method. Describes the method of secondary processing applied to a complex observation result. LBANMETH should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist LBANMET (e.g. 'CKD-EPI CREATININE 2021 FORMULA') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.

name: LBFAST
required: Mandatory if collected on the requisition form
label: Fasting status. • If subject was fasting: 'Y' • If subject was not fasting: 'N' • If not relevant: NULL

name: LBDTC
required: Mandatory when date is present at source
label: Datetime of specimen collection in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, e.g. 2020-10-12T14:30:15.

name: LBTPT
required: Mandatory when assessment is performed at a planned time point
label: Planned time point name, e.g. '10 MIN AFTER', see 'Time points' sheet.

name: SUBEVNUM
label: Subevent number, which is used to distinguish unplanned resampling. Resampling is done when the original sample cannot be used. • If no resampling: SUBEVNUM should be 0. • If resampling is done for the same VISIT, SUBJID and TOPICCD but different --DTC and --REFID:  SUBEVNUM should be 0 for the first sample and it should be incremented by 1 for each new sample.  Note: SUBEVNUM should not be used for retest of the same sample as only the final test result should be delivered.

name: COMMENTALL
label: Comments that do not fit into other columns. Do not include line break characters like carriage return or line feed.

name: STUDYID
label: Study ID. Default to 'XX9999-9999'.

name: LBNAM
label: Short name of the laboratory that performed the assessment. Default to 'LAB X'. [Use the same name instructions as used for LBNAM in the 'LAB, structure' sheet]

name: TOPICCD
label: Topic code, see 'LAB, content' sheet.

name: SEX
label: Gender that the reference range applies to: • 'F' for Female • 'M' for Male • 'B' for Both

name: STARTDATE
label: Effective from date in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD.

name: ENDDATE
required: Mandatory when the reference range has an end date
label: Effective to date in  ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD.

name: AGEMIN
label: Lower age limit (including lowest value).

name: AGEMINU
label: Lower age limit unit: • 'DAYS' • 'WEEKS' • 'MONTHS' • 'YEARS'

name: AGEMAX
label: Upper age limit (including highest value).

name: AGEMAXU
label: Upper age limit unit: • 'DAYS' • 'WEEKS' • 'MONTHS' • 'YEARS'

name: RANGEMIN
required: Mandatory when the reference range has a lower limit
label: Lower limit of reference range (including lowest value). RANGEMIN should be NULL if there is no lower limit. See 'Supplier guidance' sheet.

name: RANGEMAX
required: Mandatory when the reference range has an upper limit
label: Upper limit of reference range (including highest value). RANGEMAX should be NULL if there is no upper limit. See 'Supplier guidance' sheet.

name: UNIT
label: Reference range unit, e.g. 'mmol/L'. For each topic code, UNIT should match UNITCOLL in the LAB data file.

name: STUDYID
label: Study ID. Default to 'XX9999-9999'.

name: DOMAIN
label: SDTM domain. Default to 'PC'.

name: SITE
label: Site identifier, e.g. '101'.

name: SUBJID
label: Subject identifier, e.g. '101201'.

name: FSUBJID
required: Mandatory when scrambled subject IDs are requested, see 'Blinding' sheet
label: Scrambled subject ID. [If scrambling is not needed:] Default to NULL.

name: VISIT
label: Visit name, see 'Visits' sheet.

name: PCREFID
label: Unique sample identifier:  Sample ID, requisition number or barcode, e.g. 'AB124578 '.

name: TOPICCD
label: Topic code, see 'PK, content' sheet.

name: SUPTEST
label: Supplier assessment name.

name: PCORRES
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained
label: Result. PCORRES should be NULL if a result is not obtained.

name: UNITCOLL
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained
label: Collected unit.  UNITCOLL should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist PKUNIT (e.g. 'umol/L') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.  Supplier should not perform unit-based conversion of results.

name: LLOQ
required: Mandatory when the lower limit of quantification for the assessment is known
label: The lower limit of quantitation for the assessment in same unit as the result.

name: ULOQ
label: The upper limit of quantitation for the assessment in same unit as the result.

name: PCSTAT
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Completion status. Populate with 'NOT DONE' if PCORRES is NULL, otherwise NULL.

name: PCREASND
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Reason why result could not be obtained. For texts that exceed 200 characters, please use the COMMENTALL column and provide an abbreviated text in PCREASND. Please discuss this approach with the Novo Nordisk study team.

name: PCNAM
label: Short name of the laboratory that performed the assessment. Default to 'LAB X'. [Short name as specified in 'List of MFT suppliers'.  Note that if the supplier is delivering results from assessments performed by other labs, the red text above should be changed to list the names of these  labs.]

name: PCSPEC
required: Mandatory, except in rare cases where specimen is irrelevant
label: Specimen type. PCSPEC should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist SPECTYPE (e.g. 'PLASMA', 'SERUM', 'URINE') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.

name: PCMETHOD
label: Method of assessment or examination. PCMETHOD should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist METHOD (e.g. 'ELISA') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.

name: PCDTC
required: Mandatory when date is present at source. It is not mandatory when PCDTC is collected as CRF data.
label: Datetime of specimen collection in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, e.g. 2020-10-12T14:30:15.

name: PCTPT
required: Mandatory when assessment is performed at a planned time point
label: Planned time point name, e.g. '10 MIN AFTER', see 'Time points' sheet.

name: SUBEVNUM
label: Subevent number, which is used to distinguish unplanned resampling. Resampling is done when the original sample cannot be used. • If no resampling: SUBEVNUM should be 0. • If resampling is done for the same VISIT, SUBJID and TOPICCD but different --DTC and --REFID:  SUBEVNUM should be 0 for the first sample and it should be incremented by 1 for each new sample.  Note: SUBEVNUM should not be used for retest of the same sample as only the final test result should be delivered.

name: COMMENTALL
label: Comments that do not fit into other columns. Do not include line break characters like carriage return or line feed.

name: STUDYID
label: Study ID. Default to 'XX9999-9999'.

name: DOMAIN
label: SDTM domain. Default to 'IS'.

name: SITE
label: Site identifier, e.g. '101'.

name: SUBJID
label: Subject identifier, e.g. '101201'.

name: FSUBJID
required: Mandatory when scrambled subject IDs are requested, see 'Blinding' sheet
label: Scrambled subject ID. [If scrambling is not needed:] Default to NULL.

name: VISIT
label: Visit name, see 'Visits' sheet.

name: REFID
label: Unique sample identifier:  Sample ID, requisition number or barcode, e.g. 'AB124578'.

name: TOPICCD
label: Topic code, see 'AB, content' sheet.

name: SUPTEST
label: Supplier assessment name.

name: ORRES
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained
label: Result. ORRES should be NULL if a result is not obtained. For categorical results, see 'AB, content' sheet.

name: UNITCOLL
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained for numeric assessments except for unitless data
label: Collected unit. UNITCOLL should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist UNIT (e.g. 'mmol/L') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.  Supplier should not perform unit-based conversion of results.  UNITCOLL should be NULL for unitless data, e.g. antibody titres.

name: STAT
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Completion status. Populate with 'NOT DONE' if ORRES is NULL, otherwise NULL.

name: REASND
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Reason why result could not be obtained. For texts that exceed 200 characters, please use the COMMENTALL column and provide an abbreviated text in REASND. Please discuss this approach with the Novo Nordisk study team.

name: NAM
label: Short name of the laboratory that performed the assessment. Default to 'LAB X'. [Short name as specified in 'List of MFT suppliers'.  Note that if the supplier is delivering results from assessments performed by other labs, the red text above should be changed to list the names of these  labs.]

name: SPEC
required: Mandatory, except in rare cases where specimen is irrelevant
label: Specimen type. SPEC should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist SPECTYPE (e.g. 'PLASMA', 'SERUM', 'URINE') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.

name: METHOD
label: Method of assessment or examination. METHOD should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist METHOD (e.g. 'ELISA') or Novo Nordisk-defined extensions.

name: DTC
required: Mandatory when date is present at source
label: Datetime of specimen collection in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, e.g. 2020-10-12T14:30:15.

name: SUBEVNUM
label: Subevent number, which is used to distinguish unplanned resampling. Resampling is done when the original sample cannot be used. • If no resampling: SUBEVNUM should be 0. • If resampling is done for the same VISIT, SUBJID and TOPICCD but different --DTC and --REFID:  SUBEVNUM should be 0 for the first sample and it should be incremented by 1 for each new sample.  Note: SUBEVNUM should not be used for retest of the same sample as only the final test result should be delivered.

name: COMMENTALL
label: Comments that do not fit into other columns. Do not include line break characters like carriage return or line feed.
